io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api

Interface CaravanRhymeRequestCycle


  • @ProviderType
public interface CaravanRhymeRequestCycle
    An OSGI service that will handle an incoming request to a server-side HalApiInterface implementation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <RequestContextType>
      void      		 processRequest(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo requestUri, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse response, Function<CaravanRhyme,RequestContextType> requestContextConstructor, Function<RequestContextType,? extends io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource> resourceImplConstructor)
      Handles the full request cycle: Create a CaravanRhyme instance Pass that instance on to the given function to create a request context instance Pass that context on to the given function to create the resource implementation to be rendered Render the resource using the JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer service Catch and handle any exceptions that are thrown in the previous steps

    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        <RequestContextType> void processRequest(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo requestUri,
                                         javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse response,
                                         Function<CaravanRhyme,RequestContextType> requestContextConstructor,
                                         Function<RequestContextType,? extends io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource> resourceImplConstructor)
        Handles the full request cycle:
        1. Create a CaravanRhyme instance
        2. Pass that instance on to the given function to create a request context instance
        3. Pass that context on to the given function to create the resource implementation to be rendered
        4. Render the resource using the JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer service
        5. Catch and handle any exceptions that are thrown in the previous steps
        Type Parameters:
        RequestContextType - a project-specific type that allows to pass on OSGI references and request-specific information to all resource implementations being created within the request cycle
        Parameters:
        requestUri - information on the URI of the incoming request
        response - the suspended response that will be asynchronously resumed
        requestContextConstructor - a function that will create a RequestContextType
        resourceImplConstructor - a function that creates the resource implementation to be rendered
